name: UnionIPS_HAJJ_CONSENTAndIPS_HAJJ_CONSENT
title: Union of IPS.HAJJ.CONSENT CodeSystem And IPS.HAJJ.CONSENT CodeSystem

concept.display: Consent for Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
concept.definition: The Pilgrim consents to share his-her International Patient Summary (IPS data) during the  provision of clinical care at Ministry of Health-Saudi Arabia in Haj District area healthcare facilities through the Haj-1445 event as any follow up care that might be needed from any healthcare practitioners
<INSERT TEXT FROM INDONESIA: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize Satusehat to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care during Hajj>

The Malaysian Hajj pilgrim has provided consent for sharing the International Patient Summary (IPS) generated from the data recorded during the Hajj pilgrim health examination, as well as the vaccination records stored on MySejahtera to Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
<INSERT TEXT FROM OMAN: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize Oman's e-Health Portal to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care>
